On Transparency and the Holders' Chat üí´

We've said it more than once ‚Äì we have a ton of plans for the future, and it's true: our roadmap is packed to the limit. We know how to craft stories, develop apps, and play around with blockchain, but there‚Äôs one thing we haven‚Äôt quite mastered yet.

We‚Äôre not great at communicating what we‚Äôre doing and what we‚Äôre planning to do. But we‚Äôll learn.

Looking around, we see that transparency today is just as much an experiment as the product mechanics we‚Äôre developing. No one is operating openly, which means we have to be the first. We‚Äôre already on the hunt for a dedicated SMM dog, but for now, we‚Äôre committing to three posts a week.
